location: Nanjing West Road, near Yanping 1st MRT Station and Circle Station, Xingyang Xingtian community
notes: High-rise 3BR/2BA apartment on 12th floor with panoramic views. Move-in ready with full furnishings including appliances. Has two balconies which require baby safety assessment for railing height/gaps. Modern building in established community with elevator and parking. Good natural light expected from high floor position. Near multiple MRT stations for convenient transportation.
